title: A structure shall mean by all dwelling areas of all persons who were enumerated as living in that one numbered house in the electoral roll of the latest date, up to 1st Jan 2000 and regardless of the number of persons, or location of rooms or access
clause_text: A structure shall mean by all dwelling areas of all persons who were enumerated as living in that one numbered house in the electoral roll of the latest date, up to 1st Jan 2000 and regardless of the number of persons, or location of rooms or access.
